name: Old-Time Eastern North Carolina Barbecue Sauce
description: After spending the weekend in the Raleigh area of North Carolina, eating my way from Allen & Son to Ed Mitchell's The Pit, I'm proud to say that I'm a full-fledged North Carolina 'cue convert. The defining style of the...

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the ingredients and let stand for at least 4 hours.
